name: slime
messages: The slime smacks you!
The slime slams you!
It does nothing! is it charging up?
The slime leaps into the air and crashes down on top of you!

name: mimic
messages: The mimic stretches out both hands
The mimic crunches on you
The mimic bares its teeth at you
The mimic attempts to swallow you whole

name: troll
messages: The troll throws a right fist at you
The troll tries to stomp on you
The troll tries to kick you
The troll brings down its club on you

name: bandit
messages: The bandit nicks you
The bandit goes for a stab
The bandit slashes at you
The bandit does a follow up slash

name: skeleton
messages: The skeleton slashes at you with its sword
The skeleton glows with dark energies
A powerful blast of dark energies hits you squarely in the chest
The skeleton seems immobile after that attack

name: goblin
messages: The goblin slashes at you
The goblin goes for a quick follow up
The goblin goes for an rising slash
The goblin takes a stab at you

name: dragon
messages: The dragon slashes at you with its claws
The Dragon bites at you
! It seems its charging up for something
A wave of fire engulf you
The endless stream of fire comes to a stop
